amendment.description: An amendment numbered 79 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase and decrease funding by $1,000,000 to combat the practice of Female Genital Mutilation.
amendment.purpose: Amendment redirects $1 million to combat the practice of Female Genital Mutilation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A076) Agreed to by recorded vote: 414 - 6 (Roll no. 325).

action.text: Amendment (A076) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
